text: James William Van Der Beek (born March 8, 1977) is an American television and movie actor. He was born in Cheshire, Connecticut. He is best known for his role as Dawson Leery in Dawson's Creek. In November 2024, Van Der Beek revealed that he has been diagnosed with colorectal cancer. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Connecticut Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors
title: James Van Der Beek
